replies.body:
All of the children,
asleep in their beds,
While visions of spatulas,
danced in their heads

It was a day full of joy,
a day full of cheer,
Our great Leader Urf,
Was finally here

But as we awoke,
And started the day,
The great one was absent,
He just never came

The sky is now black,
and all hope is gone,
Oh Rito how could you,
What have you done

Logged on and agreeing. 
Adding my voice. 
Much disappointment.
No URF to rejoice.

The manatee is gone but we now have a clue;
A voice saying "draaaven" this much is true.
Our Urf has been stolen this april fools day
Draven how could you? Return him post haste.

Why Rito why?! I've been waiting a year.
To play URF, of course, full of laugh and cheers.
How disappointing now would've been perfecting timing.
God dammit now even I am rhyming!!!

Urf is gone, but do not be sore
Riot will bring him back, of this im sure.
But until then, Draven will do,
I just hope it does'nt last more than a year or 2 :(

Middle is missing
Top and bottom too
Could they be ganking?
Oh, {{champion:119}}  Pentakill~

Oh RIto, pls heed our cries,
{{item:3070}}  stream down, every player's eyes.
You promised URF would be release twice,
How hard is it, to make it three times?

Well, I stayed up waiting for URF, It didn't come, in my state of depression and sleep deprivation i wrote a poem, went to sleep, woke up to a URF themed poetry slam in the comments section. And i have never been happier.

Our manatee friend has left us this day,
But he will return, stronger than before,
We want more our spatulas than axes to play,
But thwarted by Draven, who we'll adore nevermore.

This is old information, we've known it for months.
Please pay attention, though I don't like to be blunt. 
URF will return this year, not once but twice!
So sit back and enjoy this joke, it's really quite nice.

the site looks so great
it took time we can all tell
we all all love draaaaaaaaven
but miss the manatee we knew so well

And so we shall wait
For that fateful day,
Where we can all be mates,
And the manatee comes out to play.

But the dragon does not make us feel so well, urf can fly thru the seas, and make our hearts swell.

U replied to the thread, but did not rhyme.
i have foiled your attempt, to waste all our time.

so go back to mid lane, with your massive stuns, the true and faithful wait for urf, and its fun.
instead of "crucial", you should've said "critical" items {{item:3031}} .  Damn riot, your pun game is off. {{champion:119}}
There's no need to Phreak out about it
RIOT PLEASE I TOLD MY BOSS I WAS SICK TODAY 7 MONTHS AGO, JUST GIVE US URF FOR ONE DAY PLEASE
Dude.  Get to work or get fired.  Caught.  I friggin knew there was no "7 month disease"...and your name shouldve tipped me off before i even hired you.  argh!
"To Draven or Not to Draven, That Is The Draven"  - Draven{{champion:119}}

"To Draven or to Draaaven" - Draven{{champion:119}} 

fixed that for you ;)
Rito knows they fucked up after reading all the comments.. rip.
Really? No URF? You messed up this time Riot.
URF OR 10K RP PLZ
The jokes on you, Rito hates you.  {{champion:35}}
URF!!!!! RITO PLZ!
I bet this is all a joke and URF is behind it all. :D

Didn't you hear about how you'll be getting a semi-random Special Game Mode every weekend, and URF will be in the rotation, so you'll get URF a couple of times in a year instead of being on april 1st?
Which sounds great... until you realize that those two times a year will amount to about 4 days as opposed the that last couple of two week long urf parties.
This is either a poorly tasted troll. Or a someone needs to get fired.
Hey, what day is it?
I hope this is a joke, and we will get URF mode.
URF please Riot{{champion:267}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:42}}

Logged to comment also.... see the problem is this, we have waited all year for urf, not that we want it couple times a year... yep that's what we been asking... the thing is... we played and supported rito... if your gonna do the rotating queue, so be it, but start it with urf, then change it. It's that easy. You made a joke that become a phenomenon.... and now you give it to us and then take it back.... sort of a bad parent. RITO were not happy..... I say if there's no urf, then boycott RITO for a week. Then they may listen.
I agree LETS RIOT AT RIOT STUDIOS! NOBODY PLAY LEAGUE UNTIL THEY GIVE US URF AND 5K RP EACH!{{summoner:11}} {{champion:119}} {{summoner:11}}
Give me urf or give me death! why would you break tradition? and fire whatever moron told you this would be a better idea...
Yes yes, the League of {{champion:119}} meme is all well and good, but where is Urf mode? You failed us this April fools day Riot Games.
RIP URF, time to go play something else.
sad {{item:3070}} {{champion:119}} {{item:3070}}  no URF
pls URF
Where's dat URF?

Welcome children, gather round as I tell you a story.
The children rejoiced as they woke from their sleep,
For Riot's great joy was the first thing they'd see.

Riot pulled a fast one (but not a fast game mode)
I refreshed and refreshed, oh why won't my game load?
Oh, what a tragedy, what an awful surprise!
The masses of League could not believe their eyes.

Usually on April Fools, we would get such a surprise,
Riot really screwed us I'll tell you no lies.
Fear crept into our hearts as we inwardly cried.

Do you know what you've done? Do you know how we feel?
Rage and regret turned our nerves to cold steel.
Anger and hatred boiled within our souls,
Very angry comments typed out by trolls.
Everyone disappointed, with no more to lose,
Not funny at all, no one is amused.
I've never been more disappointed in Riot...
up vote this comment if you think Urf > draveeennn

There once was a little {{champion:119}} as happy as could be,
He awoke to the day where he could Ultra Rapid Fire his skills,
And thus fell to the ground with tears in his eyes,
As all hope was lost, for the savior URF was no where to be found.
Its my birthday and one of my favorite gifts is urf.... why you do this rito. Urf is the best..
{{champion:201}}
BRING BACK URF!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I DONT WANT THIS DRAVEN!!!!!!!!
This type of shit really ticks me off.

If you don't want to give us URF..then atlas give us a way to disable the draven heads...its useless,annoying and stupid...all it does is distract me and causes lag...i don't think i can play this way until April 3rd

Hello.....?
It's me......
I've been wondering was it all a joke are you hiding under the scene.....
they say times suppose to heal ya but i cant wait any longer....
Hello riot..... can you hear me?
Im in Missouri more like misery my life is not complete without my love.....
I need it back.....
I've waited all damn year to have you prank me like that?....
So hello from the players sideeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
id like you to know how we striiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiive
we just want our urf back u dont gotta be so rudeeeeee
and i know it sounds a biiiiit crude but you knoooowww.....{{item:3070}}
What the heck? I expected URF. Rito you've let me and the majority of the players down. This is bullcrap
